sources.title: Public Stenographer
sources.description: Ann, a public stenographer at the large downtown hotel, and she is in the middle of a large swindle. Jimmy, the rich kid who is chasing her, may be involved in the swindle as well.

sources.title: Public Stenographer
sources.description: Title: Public Stenographer Summary: A stenographer who works at a large hotel finds herself caught in the middle of a major swindle. Directed by: Lewis D. Collins Actors: Production Company: Screencraft Productions Release Date: 10 January 1934 (USA) Aspect Ratio: 1.37 : 1 The wisecracking and attractive public stenographer Ann McNair spends much of her time fending off the touchy hands of her employers, but the handsome James "Jimmy" Martin Jr. learns to play it cool if he's going to play for keeps. But is he playing for keeps? As Ann at long last drops her hard-boiled veneer she gets more involved with Jimmy and with a scam that could lead to ruin.

metadata.Plot: The wisecracking and attractive public stenographer Ann McNair spends much of her time fending off the touchy hands of her employers, but the handsome James "Jimmy" Martin Jr. learns to play it cool if he's going to play for keeps. But is he playing for keeps? As Ann at long last drops her hard-boiled veneer she gets more involved with Jimmy and with a scam that could lead to ruin.
metadata.Actors: Lola Lane, William Collier Jr., Esther Muir
